title: Can't Log Onto League or Submit a ticket
body: I am suck loading for around 30-60 seconds then it gives me an error telling me to try again later. I wait one painful day and it is still not working. I have tried everything on your website, even tried to repatch it with the Hextech Repair Tool. Now it won't even patch. I can't submit a ticket to your Riot Support page because it won't let me log in there either.

replies.body:
Hey there, sorry for all of this hassle you've been going through.  :(  It sounds like your network is struggling to reach the game server and kicking you off.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up.  The HRT is also good to try auto-configuring your game file, but a reinstall or repatch won't do too much for a connection issue.  

If you continue running into issues, you can also reach out to us directly through email via support@riotgames.com.  I hope that helps!
